QuestData.Title: Furious Familiars
QuestData.Description:
<The wildlife in the foothills appear to be under Helena's spell, and this villager appears to be one of their victims.
They must be the cause of the recent disappearances from Fallhaven.
Perhaps if their numbers were cut down, they would pose less of a threat to the townspeople.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 enthralled animals in the Shrouded Foothills.
QuestData.RewardText: <With the cursed wildlife culled, the villagers of Fallhaven should no longer have to fear the foothills.>
